level.text: The total aggregate value of all prizes to be awarded at a Monte Carlo night party shall not exceed one hundred thousand dollars ($100,000) per event.
There shall be no cash prizes awarded at a Monte Carlo night party.
All prizes shall be awarded. Prizes may be distributed by either an auction sale or by a raffle.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to May 20, 1988, the D.C. Lottery and Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking at 29 DCR 5016, 5039 (November 12, 1982).
